artist: Jack Larsen; Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description:
Blue dominates.  Plain weave or Twill variation.
Similar to Pomegranate. Blue & 2 green warp. Light green & tan weft.  Plain weave variation. Tag "#2" attached. Inside a mat folder with 99.1.1213.20,22,23.  Larsen descripive information written inside. "H-8B" written on front of folder. (blue green tan)
title: Lapis Development Sample
